Access document

NAME_HU

Acceptability criterion.

Estimad@ NAME_OWNER

The acceptability criterion "NAME_CRI" has been approved by NAME_USER. 


Thanking your attention.

For any questions we are at your disposal.

NAME_HU

Historia de Usuario

Dear @ NAME_OWNER

User history has culminated, is currently awaiting you proceed with the verification of the same, with Acceptability Criteria. 

The process to follow is:

1) Enter the database Vauxoo through the link at the bottom of this email.
2) Select the button "edit" in the user story.
3) Check Acceptance Criteria.
4) Check that the acceptance criteria are met.
5) Once checked each criterion to select "OK" indicating that it complies with the revised result box.

All acceptance criteria shall be re-validated by a consultant Vauxoo the end of the Sprint, so to formally close the compliance requirement.


Thanking your attention.

For any questions we are at your disposal.
